text: Hey! Oh cool, I've not used substance myself but I know they've started using it here and everyone seems to love it :smile: Looking good! I think maybe now it's a little too blue in the highlights, and maybe too dull overall. The wall has a fair amount more red than your unit, you could maybe soften the shadow a little too - the shadow angle is making it look like its farther away from the wall than it appears? You could also go the other way and pull the reds down, and blues up in the plate if you wanted a more overcast gloomy look!
How did the written work go? Hope your deadline goes well today, I guess it's for this shot? Is this your last one before Christmas?

Last deadline, I didn’t have the chance to apply your feedback, i have been in uni since 5pm yesterday, stayed overnight! :sweat_smile: last day of uni and then off for a month! I’ve got an evaluation for the shot
Exhausted to the point of passing out, been in uni for about 21 hours straight :sweat_smile:

Jesus man! How much longer do you have to go?! I wouldn't worry, it's in a really good place! :slightly_smiling_face: When is your evaluation, or have you had that already? Everyone starts going on holidays next week, and the studio closes over xmas, so we're trying to get ahead / catch up on things haha We had our xmas party on Wednesday too, not sure why a Wednesday, but yesterday was not productive at all :smile: so extra to catch up on!
What are your plans over xmas, do you think you'll fit in much time for your bigger project or are you going to pick it back up in the new year?

For the evaluation I submitted  a link and i will just update it later... ( tricks of the trade) i will go crash a bit because it’s my second all-nighter this week in addition to 3 night shifts :sweat_smile:i will try and get some rest in the next few days to make up for the lost sleep.. need to catch up on about 25ish hours that i lost this week. I will try and practise some rigging and animating because i am out of touch with 3D. The final comp ended up looking nice afterall! I did some post production in after effects :relaxed: cc rain, vignette, grain it looks a bit more stylised  not sure if it’s better or worse, i will try and get you a link for the actual clip when i get the chance after waking up ! Are you going anywhere this xmas?
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S23fr-WK_oI&feature=youtu.be>.  I know quite a few things are off but it’s the best i could do. I will write stuff in my evaluation :sweat_smile:
